description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              We are looking for a Front-End Web Developer who is motivated to combine the art of design with the art of programming to create Media Game/ Online data reporting system on Web based. Your responsibilities will include translation of the UI/UX design wireframes to actual code that will produce visual elements of the application. You will work with the UI/UX designer and bridge the gap between graphical design and technical implementation, taking an active role on both sides and defining how the application looks as well as how it works.
              

              ** Responsibilities:
              
              •	Work closely with back-end engineers to deliver most optimal solutions possible.
              
              •	Develop new user-facing features.
              
              •	Build reusable code and libraries for future use.
              
              •	Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs.
              
              •	Collaborate with developers, team leader, and product owner in requirements analysis and the development through all stages of the SDLC.
              
              •	Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability.
              
              •	Assure that all user input is validated before submitting to back-end
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              •	You have at least 2 years experiences as a Front-End Web Developer.(JavaScript, VueJS)
              
              •	Good experience in HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript.
              
              •	Experience with JavaScript frameworks/libraries more powerful than jQuery (e.g. Vue, ReactJS, Angular 2, Ember, Knockout, Backbone…)
              
              •	Experience in Node.js is a plus.
              
              •	Experience in CSS framework is a plus.
              
              •	Good experience in building a single page application including front-end routing, 2-way data binding, client-side rendering and JSON-based RESTful APIs.
              
              •	Experience in LESS, SASS, CoffeeScript, Webpack, Yeoman is a plus.
              
              •	Passionate about building a great UI/UX apps.
              
              •	Good understanding of SEO principles and ensuring that application will adhere to them.
              
              •	Proficient understanding of code versioning GIT.
              
              •	Experience with Agile (Scrum or Kanban).
              
              •	Good English communication skills (especially reading and writing).
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
